arts.ttl: Pisa vs Fiorentina: Tuscan derby thriller
arts.sum: The most recent Serie A match in Pisa was on October 7, 1990: Pisa-Fiorentina 0-4 (goals by Fuser, Kubik brace, and Di Chiara). This was the only match among the 10 derbies played at Pisa`s home ground where both teams were coached by foreign managers (Mircea Lucescu and Sebastiao Lazaroni).

arts.ttl: Pisa vs Fiorentina - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Pisa and Fiorentina, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
